title: I lost my promos by winning the game
body: So I was playing league with my friends and suddenly my power went off. There was a blackout. After 10 min it was fixed and I joined the game. I told my team what happened and apologized. We WON the game. I did NOT lose it.  And I lost my promos beacuse I was AFK  " the entire game" even tho I came back... Why?

replies.body: Hey, sorry to hear about the power going off here.  :(  Even if your team wins, anyone who is marked as a leaver per [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will receive a loss.  It sounds like you were gone for long enough to get marked as a leave in this case.  Hopefully the issue causing the power loss is resolved now so you can continue on with your series.  Good luck!
